snippet.title: SAND – Gameplay Reveal Trailer | tinyBuild Connect 2024
snippet.description:
Sign up for the SAND Beta now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1431300/Sand

We are proud to finally share with you all the very first gameplay footage of SAND!

SAND is a PVPVE game where players operate mechanical walkers called Tramplers to explore the remnants of a once prosperous planet, now left in ruin. Explore a massive, procedurally generated world, survive encounters with rival smugglers, engage in trampler battles and make it off planet with any valuables found throughout the world.

Developed by team Hologryph in Lviv, Ukraine. Support Ukraine - https://u24.gov.ua/

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SANDtheGame/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/sandthegame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sandgamehq/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@sandgamehq
Discord - https://discord.gg/rTCCE8HZD3
Wishlist Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1431300
